Allen Iverson 's Big Mikegest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer. Just get your swagger back, Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him.`` That's really what I did. It helped me out.'' Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds,
